text: Broxbourne railway station, opened in 1840, serves Broxbourne in Hertfordshire, England. It is on the West Anglia Main Line, and train services are provided by Abellio Greater Anglia, who also manage the station. ==Gallery== Image:Broxbourne railway station 1.jpg Image:Broxbourne railway station Platforms.jpg Image:Broxbourne railway station staircase from ticket office.jpg ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Railway stations opened in 1840 Category:Railway stations served by National Express East Anglia Category:1840 establishments in England
title: Broxbourne railway station
